attributes.action: Allow parents to be able to watch their children take part at school sports day.
attributes.additional_details: It’s the right thing to do to be allowed to see your own child participate in anything that makes them happy and will create memories that they can share with each other.
attributes.background: Allow the parents to be able to watch their children take part at their own sports day.A sports day that takes part outside where their can be social distancing and in fresh air.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/589244
